title: Enhancing Patient Care Practical Competencies: Critical Thinking Capacity Development Program for Pre-Service Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational pedagogical knowledge and understanding of general teaching-learning processes
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Preservice teachers can explain systematic question-generation methods for applying critical thinking in diverse educational contexts.
Preservice teachers can develop lesson plans integrating critical thinking elements through peer feedback and instructor scaffolding during instructional design.
Preservice teachers can analyze and improve their thought processes through online discussions and reflective writing.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
